modShortDescription: Have you ever felt like the zombies in 7 Days to Die look clean, simple, weird and overall kind of boring? Then this great mod is for you!
modDescription:
Have you ever felt like the zombies in 7 Days to Die look too plain, clean, simple, weird and overall kind of boring? Then this great mod is for you!

It’s finally here, Xtrakicking’s zombie [texture](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-textures/) replacement mod that he has been working on for the past few weeks. This mod changes the appearance of almost every boring and simple-looking zombie out there. With this mod the [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) in the game will actually look like terrifying, gross and blood-thirsty walking corpses.

You’ll gasp as they approach you with their hands and mouths stained with blood from past victims, rotting and decaying flesh that’s ripped apart and shows their inner flesh and organs, big and devastating wounds that leave their bones out in the open and necrosis that will make the apocalypse more interesting.

If you want to see how the zombies look before installing it, you can check them out in [Xtrakicking’s blog](http://7daystodiezombietextureoverhaul.blogspot.com.es/2017/08/screamer-time.html).

Here’s a list of all the zombies that have been changed or altered:

**To Do Lists:**  
\-Move the mod over to xpath.  
\-Add multiple variants of each zombie once the mod moves to xpath.

## Important Notice

It seems like the devs will be changing the design of zombies in A19\. This means that either this mod will remain avaliable for A18.4 and previous versions only; that Xtrakicking will only update those with no design change if any, or that he will make a new and different version for A19 (or maybe a version that only adds more blood to the new upcoming zombies).

Either way, A18.4 might be the last version of this mod featuring most of these zombie textures (unless an A18.5 comes out).

## Changelog

* New version for A18.4 avaliable. Enjoy! **_(new)_**
* Updated for version 18.2!
* New and improved Utility Worker zombie!

Installing instructions included in the readme.txt file.

**[Download](https://mega.nz/#F!V75FkAQJ!FitWKrCYPkg2nhJ1e_MTWQ)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/4383-zombie-texture-replacement/).

**Credits:** Xtrakicking
